name: conductionnl/openregister
description: Quickly build data registers based on schema.json

scripts.phpmd: phpmd lib text phpmd.xml || echo 'PHPMD not installed, skipping...'
scripts.test:unit: ./vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite="Unit Tests" --colors=always || echo 'Tests require Nextcloud environment, skipping...'
scripts.test:integration: ./vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite="Integration Tests" --colors=always || echo 'Tests require Nextcloud environment, skipping...'
scripts.test:db: ./vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite="Database Tests" --colors=always || echo 'Tests require Nextcloud environment, skipping...'
scripts.test:service: ./vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite="Service Tests" --colors=always || echo 'Tests require Nextcloud environment, skipping...'
scripts.quality:phpcs-score: ./vendor/bin/phpcs --standard=phpcs.xml --report=json lib/ | php -r "\$json = json_decode(file_get_contents('php://stdin'), true); \$errors = \$json['totals']['errors'] ?? 0; \$warnings = \$json['totals']['warnings'] ?? 0; \$score = 1000 - \$errors - (\$warnings / 2); echo 'PHPCS Score: ' . \$score . ' (Errors: ' . \$errors . ', Warnings: ' . \$warnings . ')' . PHP_EOL;"
scripts.quality:phpmd-score: phpmd lib/ json phpmd.xml | php -r "\$input = file_get_contents('php://stdin'); \$json = json_decode(\$input, true); \$violations = count(\$json['files'] ?? []); \$score = 1000 - (\$violations * 10); echo 'PHPMD Score: ' . \$score . ' (Violations: ' . \$violations . ')' . PHP_EOL;" || echo 'PHPMD not available'
scripts.quality:psalm-score: psalm --output-format=json --no-cache | php -r "\$input = file_get_contents('php://stdin'); \$json = json_decode(\$input, true); \$errors = count(\$json ?? []); \$score = 1000 - (\$errors * 5); echo 'Psalm Score: ' . \$score . ' (Errors: ' . \$errors . ')' . PHP_EOL;" || echo 'Psalm not available'
